generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Behavior.slime Float Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allow slimes to float in water / lava. Can only be used by Slime and Magma Cubes.

fields.title: Jump Chance Percentage
fields.description: Percent chance a slime or magma cube has to jump while in water / lava. Default value: 0.8.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Determines the multiplier the entity's speed is modified by when moving through water / lava. Default value: 1.2.
